resources.string: Get a notification when you get out of a vehicle or finish an activity to remind you to wash your hands
Get a notification at scheduled times you have indicated in the application
Did you have a good walk? 🚶
Walking 30 minutes a day is one of the greatest practices for having a good health 💪 Remember to wash your hands before eating or touching your face 🤭 so you can have even better health 😉
It\'s always funny to run 🙂 but usually it comes with a lot of sweat 😅. Try washing your hands as soon as possible or, even better, have a shower 🛀
I always enjoy going cycling - it makes you feel free 🌲. Your bike\'s handles were probably dirty so try to wash your hands as soon as you can 💦👏

In public transport there are lots of people and you don\'t know if they are ill or not 😷. Even in your own car there can be diseases in the handles or in the steering wheel 🚗, so try to wash your hands as soon as you can for avoiding diseases 💦👏
Allow the application to collect and send anonymous data with data activity and analytics information
Allow the application to track its performance and send anonymous data for improving in-app experience

string-array.name: breakfast_comments
string-array.item: During sleep your hands get dirty, it\'s important to wash them before having breakfast 😴
Washing your hands before breakfast will ensure you a good day 😉
30 seconds for good health? Where do I sign! Just wash your hands 😉💦👏

resources.string: Time to lunch and wash your hands! 🍱

string-array.name: lunch_comments
string-array.item: Having a good day? Let\'s continue with it having your hands clean 😁
After a busy morning it\'s time to eat and do it clean 😉
If you have gone to the street is even more important to wash your hands before having lunch 💦👏

string-array.name: dinner_comments
string-array.item: The day is finishing and you can do it fully by 💦👏
Remember before having dinner and going to sleep to wash your hands and count sheeps 🐑
Do you know that washing your hands can keep you safe from more than 15 diseases? That\'s a lot 😮

resources.string: Let\'s learn how to wash our hands

Join me in this trip in which we will learn how to completely wash our hands 💦👏. This is very important not only for you but for everyone who is around you: from a baby 👶 to your grandparents 👴👵. It\'s a small responsibility act that only lasts 30 seconds.
Remember, it\'s not only for you but for them.

string-array.name: washing_hands_titles
string-array.item: 3. Back-clean and in between the fingers
6. Cleaning the tips and nails of your fingers

string-array.name: washing_hands_descriptions
string-array.item: By wetting your hands and applying enough soap, rub your hands together for spreading the soap 🧼.
Now, using the spread soap, clean in between your fingers 🖐 (as shown in the video).
By putting one hand on the back of the other one, clean it and in between the fingers 🤚. Do the same with the other hand.
As you can see, your fingers are not clean yet 👀, so put the back of your fingers against your palms and rub.
We almost forget them 😬! Clean both your thumbs using the other hand 👍.
Now it\'s time to clean both your tips and nails. Put them against your palm and clean them. Wow 😱! Such a beautiful nails! 💅

Finally, clean the top of your hand (near your wrist). Then, rinse your hands in water and dry them with a disposable towel 🧻. And finally, use it for turning off the tap. And it\'s done, you have finished! 🎊🎉
